code: import axios from'axios';var host=process.env.PORT||3000;require('dotenv').config();var api=axios.create({baseURL:process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL+"/api"});export var pipeBis=function pipeBis(){return api.get("/");};export var pipeAllBis=function pipeAllBis(){return api.get('/businesses');};var apis={pipeBis:pipeBis,pipeAllBis:pipeAllBis};export default apis;
